lead_paragraph: BERK--Paula Iris, mother and grandmother, predeceased by husband Richard Berk, passed away December 21, 2015. She leaves behind three daughters and their spouses, Lisa Roth, Malcolm Roth, Mindy McMahon, Tim McMahon, and Kimberly Aaronson; six grandchildren, Lucas, Clark and Annie McMahon, Rachel and David Behrmann, Andre Aaronson. She will be missed by all. We love you Mom, Grandma. Rest in peace. 1/3
